alpfore.encoder.system_encoder module¶

class alpfore.encoder.system_encoder.SystemEncoder(scales: Dict[str, Dict[str, float]], seq_vocab: str)¶

Bases: object

Turn human-readable DNA-NP parameters into a numeric feature vector.

classmethod decode(X: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray¶

Inverts encode.

Parameters

X (array_like, shape (n, 40) or (40,)) – 4 scaled meta-features + 36 one-hot bits (12 × 3).

Returns

Columns: sequence (str), ssl (int), lsl (int), sgd (int)

Return type

ndarray, shape (n, 4) (dtype=object)
